title: We Are Being Poisoned To Death As Biden Dithers (Ep 1808)
description:
We are being poisoned by China! In this episode I address the most important national security story of our time. I also address the devastating economic news that popped yesterday. 

News Picks:

A great political realignment is happening.

An illegal immigrant has been arrested for the rape of a ten year old girl. 

We are being poisoned by China.


Travel industry sees further economic woe, seeks Washington’s help.

Did Elon Musk just outfox all of Twitter?


Starbucks is closing stores in lib cities. 


TWO-FACED: 8 Lib Outlets Warning About Privacy Post-Roe Pushed Orwellian COVID-19 Contact Tracing.
